# Entity.addComponentOrReplace method

Adds or replaces a component in the entity.

**Signature:**
```javascript
addComponentOrReplace<T extends object>(component: T): T;
```
**Returns:** `T`

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  `component` | `T` | component instance. |
